children.name: Basque Folk Music
children.description: Traditional Folk Music of the Basque people.

children.name: Catalan Folk Music
children.description: Blend of local styles and influences from the Iberian Peninsula region and the Catalonian area of Southern France.

children.name: Euskal kantagintza berria
children.description: Basque genre born during the 1960s inspired by Nova cançó and Chanson.

children.name: Nova cançó
children.description: Arose in Catalonia during the Franco dictatorship, sung in Catalan as a way to resist restrictions placed on regional languages in Spain and retain a regional identity.

children.name: Villancico
children.description: Style of polyphonic lyric poetry popular between the 14th and 18th centuries that developed in Spain, Portugal, and their associated colonies.
